name: Photoshop - Web Deisgn
discription: Working in web design involves creating UI elementsâ€”icons, graphics. Adobe Photoshop provides the capabilities needed to make these design elements transition smoothly and easily to production.

name: Sketch - Mobile App
discription: Sketch is a vector-based tool used for desktop and mobile UI design, mockups and prototypes, and today it's considered an industry standard. You can also edit and manipulate photos with Sketch.

name: Corel - Fashion Deisgn
discription: CorelDRAW is the most popular vector design software in the professional computer-aided fashion design industry, with many fashion designers using it to draw their mannequins and produce their designs.

name: Web Development
discription: Web development is the building and maintenance of websites; it's the work that happens behind the scenes to make a website look great, work fast and perform well with a seamless user experience.

name: Data Analysis
discription: Descriptive Analysis is the type of analysis of data that helps describe, show or summarize data points in a constructive way such that patterns might emerge that fulfill every condition of the data.

name: Online Security and Ethical Hacking
discription: Ethical hacking involves an authorized attempt to gain unauthorized access to a computer system, application, or data. Carrying out an ethical hack involves duplicating strategies and actions of malicious attackers.

name: Accounting and Bookkeeping
discription: A Bookkeeper is responsible for recording and maintaining a business' financial transactions, such as purchases, expenses, sales revenue. In accounting, the terms sales and, invoices, and payments.

name: Graphic Design
discription: Graphic design is a craft where professionals create visual content to communicate messages. By applying visual hierarchy and page layout techniques, designers use typography and pictures to meet users' specific needs

name: Photography
discription: Photography is the art, application, and practice of creating durable images by recording light, either electronically by means of an image sensor, or chemically by means of a light-sensitive material such as photographic film.

name: Career Coaching
discription: Career coaching is a type of personal coaching that helps people find greater fulfillment in their careers by establishing professional goals, creating a plan and overcoming obstacles that may be in the way.

name: User Testing
discription: User testing is the process through which the interface and functions of a website, app, product, or service are tested by real users who perform specific tasks in realistic conditions.

name: Voice-Over Acting
discription: Voice-over actors, sometimes called just voice actors, provide vocal talent for a project without their faces ever being seen. Many industries use the work of voice-over actors, including commercials, radio, movie trailers, sports broadcasts
